title: Full Stack E-Commerce Website
description: Build a complete e-commerce platform with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration. Use React for frontend and Node.js/Express for backend.

title: Fitness Tracking Mobile App
description: Create a comprehensive fitness tracking application for iOS or Android. Include workout logging, progress tracking, goal setting, and data visualization features.

title: Custom Data Structure Library
description: Implement a comprehensive library of data structures including advanced trees, graphs, and hash tables. Include thorough testing and performance analysis.

title: Algorithm Visualization Tool
description: Build an interactive tool that visualizes various sorting and graph algorithms. Allow users to step through algorithm execution and see performance metrics.

title: Python Data Analysis Project
description: Analyze a large dataset using Python. Perform statistical analysis, create visualizations, and present insights. Include data cleaning and preprocessing steps.

title: Discrete Math Problem Solver
description: Create a tool that solves various discrete mathematics problems including logic proofs, set operations, and combinatorics calculations.

title: Enterprise Software System
description: Design and implement an enterprise-level software system using advanced OOP principles, design patterns, and best practices. Include comprehensive testing.

title: Rocket Launch Simulation
description: Develop a simulation program that models rocket launches with realistic physics. Include thrust calculations, atmospheric effects, and trajectory visualization.

title: Airfoil Design and Analysis
description: Design custom airfoils and analyze their aerodynamic performance using computational fluid dynamics tools. Compare with theoretical predictions.

title: CubeSat Mission Design
description: Complete mission design for a CubeSat satellite including systems integration, power budget, thermal analysis, and communication architecture.
